Intensive discussion was held today at the House of Representatives Budget Committee. Regarding the issue of political funds, I believe it is my responsibility to repeatedly explain it until you are satisfied.
On my birthday, I received congratulatory words from many people on my wish. Thank you very much. It really encourages me.

Tomorrow we will hold "Real Pigeon Cafe" at the official residence. This is my first childhood raising cafe. Actually, the second grandchild was born the other day, but tomorrow I am looking forward to see a story from my mum and children who have children who will live the same era as my grandchildren.
Watch the list of confidence in Thailand. The Prime Minister responds to several correspondents on Channel 11.
It is a real pigeon cafe from now. I am looking forward to it.

Today I invited my mother and dad raising parents to the official residence and opened a real pigeon cafe. I was able to listen to "the present living word" from everyone, and I spent a very precious time. I played with the children and returned to my childhood. Please keep listening to your voice.
Tomorrow we will start "Cooperation for work". See the program for the first two days here: http://bit.ly/bZXD80

The Paralympics will begin on March 12. I attended the encouragement meeting earlier. I feel I've divided the energy of the players. At the Olympic Games, speed skating boys 500 meters, Keiichiro Nagashima played silver medal, and Kato Tsuyoshi won a bronze medal wonderfully. congratulations!

Many comments have been received from everyone about the real pigeon cafe the day before yesterday. Thank you very much. I would like to reflect the opinions you've sent to the pigeon cafe next time. You can see the state of the day from PC here. http://bit.ly/afSQlk

The first party party debate as the leader of the ruling party ended. I regret to say that it was a discussion centered on my own political funds etc., but I tried to explain as carefully as possible. In future, I would like to discuss such a feeling that I want to improve this country, so that people can convey to my citizens.
In Italy for Sanremo Festival where Andrea Bocelli found fame & fortune. Hoping message of Education for All finds stardom too!
Flattered 2 be guest of honor at 60th Sanremo Festival! Looking forward to display of Italian talent and plugging Education for All

I thank the Italian people whose love has been with me from very first day, when I became queen at 28, scared & unsure.

At #mwc signal loud & clear-they have power 2 give children teacher in their pocket, classroom in their hand, & future at their fingertips
#mwc Smooth operators can be game-variables for education-now that's a disruptive innovation I'd take to the bank!

We held a social gathering around Bill Drayton called "Father of Social Entrepreneur". I felt the importance of the idea of ​​"transformation" that changes behavior to make society better and the importance of "empathy" to share human pain. I think that Drayton's story gave the young social entrepreneurs great courage.

I met Kenya Prime Minister Odininga. "I can not meet mountains and mountains, but humans can meet each other." It is a proverb equivalent to Swahili's "Ichigo-no-kai". Do you not feel respect for nature and humans? We will cooperate so that Africa can develop beautiful nature while developing.

I went to the primary school in Tokyo, crime prevention volunteers, and post-partum care sites. People in the community and NPO touched the appearance of teaching children Bamboo dragonfly, patrolling crime prevention and caring for mothers after childbirth and realized the spread of "new public". Especially the female activity was impressive. http://bit.ly/aT2g99

I am looking forward to the performance of the Olympic Games, but it is a great actress award for Terashima Shinobu's Berlin Film Festival's leading actress. In Berlin, director Yoji Yoji won the Special Achievement Award, and the work of the Director General of the act received the International Critics Federation Prize. Activities of Japanese people around the world, we are proud.

Today at the House of Representatives Budget Committee, there was discussion on economic and diplomatic focus. I could not attend the LDP, but I discussed about the economy, deflationary measures, security and so on.
The Diet deliberation of the child allowance bill has finally begun. It is a bill to put the promise in the manifest into practice. We will firmly deliberate and aim for the establishment.

My wife made "Rice gratin" grain declared when trying trial at Sunday's event. I also used soy milk, but I made it delicious as expected. When you use rice flour, you get a dashy texture. I would like to try it elsewhere.

Young people may not understand, but muscle aches slowly after a few days when they are over 60 years old. I did something like a photo on Saturday, but the abdominal muscles are sore so long. I have to exercise more usually. http://bit.ly/dAWou 7
There is no new agenda for the new cabinet.

An earthquake of M 8.8 occurred in Chile. I am contemplating the victims of a major earthquake following Haiti. At the local embassy, ​​we are working on confirming the safety of 38 Japanese residents near the epicenter. We instructed related ministries and agencies to prepare for quick support.
Returning from inspection damage earthquake concepcion-talcahuano. The most painful loss of lives. We will have great challenge of reconstruction
Thailand's Prime Minister Abhisit Vejjajiva has signed a memorandum of understanding (MOU) on Channel 11.
Prime Minister Speeches "Future of Municipality: Future of Thailand" http://ow.ly/1c3kF
Back at my old stomping ground today, American University in Cairo (AUC). Memories of student life flooding back to me!
Here to give my perspective on civic engagement in the Arab world. You can watch live in a few mins http://bit.ly/dDcOJf

Yesterday I was chased by tsunami countermeasures and support measures for the Chile earthquake, I could not update blogs or tweet, but I tried everything to minimize the damage of the tsunami. Today, upon request from the Chilean Government, we sent a medical team immediately.

The closing ceremony of the Vancouver 2010 Olympic Games was held. I got a great impression from the battle over the 17 days, five medals, from every game. All the players and stakeholders, thanks for your hard work. Thank you! I'm also looking forward to the Paralympics from March 12.

From today, "suicide measures strengthening month" to protect the life begins. As part of that, the government will also develop sleep campaigns. If you feel tired but you can not sleep anymore, please consult your doctor. http://bit.ly/dmSxq9
The ASLG launches its website - www.theaslg.com - check out what the leaders in sustainability are doing in the Arab Region
For the Arab speakers amongst you, check out this blog about my trip down memory lane to Egypt yesterday http://bit.ly/bVthJr

Today's budget passed the House of Representatives. Although I was relieved, I finally got back at the marathon turning point. I still can not get out of my mind! It is deliberation at the Upper House from tomorrow.
Out of good and fruitful conversation with Hillary Clinton. We talked about reconstruction post earthquake, democracy, energy, technology and future

It is a meeting from now. It is a pleasant morning. Although I am lying to say that I am not sleepy. Recently, it gets a little bright even at the same 6 o'clock, I feel the arrival of spring. Today is the Upper House Budget Committee. I would like to discuss the policy firmly.

I met Japanese Americans who are active in various fields in the USA. I talked about the hot feeling that I wanted to be a "bridge" between Japan and the United States. I am happy. I realized that Japanese Americans are enriching Japan-US relations.
